outline:
1. to mock, deride, ridicule
    1. (Qal) to mock, deride, have in derision
    2. (Niphal) to stammer
    3. (Hiphil) to mock, deride
kjv_def: have in derision, laugh (to scorn), mock (on), stammering.
strongs_def: to deride; by implication (as if imitating a foreigner) to speak unintelligibly
